col2_html.content:
A True Destination Among Times Square Hotels

We’re modern, but not everything-is-beige modern. The opposite, in fact, which you’ll notice the moment you enter the lobby. We're a bit showy—this is the theatre district, after all—but we’re also welcoming, with rooms and suites that enfold you in comfort. 

Our location puts all that makes New York amazing at your fingertips. Visit off-the-beaten-path restaurants in Hell’s Kitchen, stroll through Central Park, or hop on one of the nearby subway lines and visit Brooklyn or renowned museums. It’s easy from here, and our concierge can help ease the way.
